properties.Land_Slide: Landsliding - Above area from the road, Hapukanda West
properties.Proposed_M: It is advisable to evacuate people from this area under the supervision of NBRO

properties.Land_Slide: Landsliding, Sinking - The boundary of Hapukanda West GND is a prone area. Therefore, Hapukanda East also has a risk.
properties.Proposed_M: It is advisable to evacuate people from this area under the supervision of NBRO

properties.Land_Slide: Sinking the road - Abarahena road near the Heen Ela
properties.Proposed_M: Since this is a landslide prone area, actions should be taken under the supervision of NBRO

properties.Land_Slide: Damages to the road - The part of the road in front of Mr. W.W. Gunarathne's store at Devahandiya main road
